: O
4.1 O

kV O
, O

kV O
, O
19/33 O
kV O
earthed O
, O
multi O
core O
power O
cables O
shall O
normally O
be O
with O
stranded O
compacted O
H2/H4 O
grade O
aluminium O
conductor O
as O
per O
IS O
: O
8130 O
- O
1984 O
, O
provided O
with O
conductor O
screening O
( O
of O
extruded O
semi-conducting B-conductorIscreen
cross I-conductorIscreen
link I-conductorIscreen
material I-conductorIscreen
) O
and O
shall O
be O
insulated O
with O
XLPE O
of O
natural O
colour O
. O

insulation O
( O
XLPE O
) O
screening O
shall O
be O
provided O
consisting O
of O
extruded O
semi-conducting B-conductorIscreen
cross I-conductorIscreen
link I-conductorIscreen
material I-conductorIscreen
in O
combination O
with O
a O
metallic B-insulationIscreen
layer I-insulationIscreen
of I-insulationIscreen
copper I-insulationIscreen
tapes I-insulationIscreen
. I-insulationIscreen

Three O
such O
screened O
cores O
shall O
be O
laid O
up O
together O
with O
fillers O
and/or O
binder O
tapes O
where O
necessary O
and O
provided O
with O
extruded O
inner O
sheathing O
of O
heat O
resistant O
PVC O
conforming O
to O
type O
ST-2 O
of O
IS O
: O
5831 O
- O
1984. O
and O
250 O
deg O
C O
under O
short O
circuit O
condition O
Maximum O
continuous O
operating O
temperature O
shall O
be O
90 O
deg O
C O
under O
normal O
operation O

shall O
be O
provided O

of O
single B-armour
galvanized I-armour

wires I-armour
( O
In O
case O
of O
Single O

cable O

be O
of O
Non-magnetic O

) O

on O
outer O
sheath O
at O
an O
interval O
of O
1 O
meter O
: O
( O
a O
) O

marking O
of O
length O
of O
the O
cable O
in O
meters O
. O

: O

8130 O

( O

) O

of O

semi-conducting B-conductorIscreen

a O

of O

or O
trade O
mark O
, O
